pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, January 18, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Shawinigan, Quebec

Private meetings

10:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour an electric vehicle charger production facility and meet with workers. He will be joined by the Mayor of Shawinigan, Michel Angers.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

10:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media scrum.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

1:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a seniors’ residence with the Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry, François-Philippe Champagne.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

Trois-Rivières, Quebec

2:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with university students and professors at the Hydrogen Research Institute. He will be joined by the Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry, François-Philippe Champagne.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
